Title: Trump wishes ‘dead terrorists’ Merry Christmas after airstrikes
Summary: U.S. President Donald Trump has said American forces carried out ‘deadly airstrikes’ against Islamic State terrorists in Northwestern Nigeria . Trump made the claim in a post on Twitter .

Title: Imo Catholic priest shot on Christmas Day
Summary: Assistant parish priest of Saint Kelvin Catholic Church, Ogbaku, in Owerri West Local Government Area, Imo State, was shot on Christmas morning . The incident raises concerns about the safety of religious leaders during public worship .

Title: Foundation awards scholarships to students of Femi Gbajabiamila school
Summary: Ajayi Foundation awarded scholarships to selected students of Femi Gbajabiamila Junior and Senior Secondary School in Itire-Ikate Local Council Development Area, Lagos State, as part of efforts to promote education and support academic excellence .

Title: Araraume salutes Christians at Christmas, calls for unity among Nigerians
Summary: Senator Ifeanyi Godwin Araraume, Ph.D., enjoined Christians to reflect on the import of Christmas brought about by the birth of Jesus Christ and its redemptive hope to millions of Christians . The APC chieftain calls for unity among Nigerians .

Title: AFCON 2025: Nigeria, Tunisia renew rivalry in Group C clash in Fès
Summary: Nigeria's Super Eagles will face Tunisia’s Carthage Eagles in a pivotal Group C match at the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Fès, Morocco, on Saturday, 27 December 2025 . The encounter carries significance for early supremacy in the group .

Title: Odinkalu questions FG’s silence as U.S. confirms ISIS presence in North-West Nigeria
Summary: Prof. Chidi Odinkalu raised concerns over what he described as a significant shift in Nigeria’s official narrative on insecurity in the North-West, following recent U.S. airstrikes on terrorist targets in the region .

Title: Reps to re-gazette 2025 tax reform laws amid public concerns
Summary: Reps to re-gazette 2025 tax reform laws amid public concerns . The laws in question are the Nigeria Tax Act, 2025, and the Joint Revenue Board of Nigeria (Establishment) Act .

Title: Benue tribal leaders demand expansion of US strikes to North-East, North-Central
Summary: Benue tribal leaders demand expansion of US strikes to North-East, North-Central . "Benue State has suffered unimaginable level of killings forcing hundreds of thousands of our people into IDPs camps"

Title: US, not Abuja, told Nigerians about terror strike — PDP slams FG
Summary: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) criticised the Federal Government over what it described as a troubling communication failure . The PDP said the United States announced a terrorist strike carried out in Nigeria before Nigerian authorities informed the public .

Title: More strikes against terrorists likely in ‘joint’ US operations – Tuggar
Summary: More strikes against terrorists likely in ‘joint’ US operations – Tuggar . Asked if there would be more strikes, he said: "It is an ongoing thing, and we are working with the US"
